subject: Re: [sugar] [PATCH] add invitation support
body:
Le vendredi 18 mai 2007 à 12:33 -0400, Eben Eliason a écrit :> Are the invitations rendered in color (as> they are in the mesh)?  
Yes, they are.And currently the colour is the only way you have to see the differencebetween an invitation and the icon to launch a new activity.
	G.
